title: Effects of a smartphone-based chatbot intervention on influenza and COVID-19 vaccine uptake among South Asians.
abstract: Smartphone-based chatbot interventions have shown promise in promoting vaccine uptake among South Asian minorities. In this two-arm, cluster-randomised, wait-list controlled trial (Chinese Clinical Trial Registry: ChiCTR2200061503; registration date: June 27
